SELECT A.EMPID AS EMPID, A.EMPPWD AS EMPPWD, A.EMPNAME AS EMPNAME, A.EMPPHONE AS EMPPHONE, A.EMPMAIL AS EMPMAIL, A.EMPLOC AS EMPLOC, A.EMPIMG AS EMPIMG, A.DEPTID AS DEPTID, B.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME, B.DIVID AS DIVID, TO_CHAR(C.WORKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORKDATE, C.AMLOC AS AMLOC, C.AMLOCDETAIL AS AMLOCDETAIL, C.PMLOC AS PMLOC, C.PMLOCDETAIL AS PMLOCDETAIL FROM EMPLOYEE A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEPTID = B.DEPTID) JOIN WORK C ON (A.EMPID = C.EMPID) WHERE A.EMPID IN (SELECT EMPIDFAV FROM FAVORITE WHERE EMPID=#{empid} ) AND C.WORKDATE = #{currdate}
